meanings.definition: A shout of acclamation or encouragement.
meanings.sent1: The crowd erupted in a loud vivat as the team scored the winning goal.
meanings.sent2: The vivat from the audience boosted the performer's confidence.
meanings.sent3: The vivat from the fans was so loud that it startled the players.
meanings.sent4: Her vivat of support echoed through the stadium, lifting everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent5: The vivat of the fans was like a wave of energy propelling the team forward.

meanings.definition: Long live (used to express good wishes to a reigning monarch).
meanings.sent1: Vivat the king! May he reign for many years to come.
meanings.sent3: Vivat the ruler! May their reign be prosperous and peaceful.
meanings.sent4: Vivat the monarch! May their legacy endure through the ages.
meanings.sent5: Vivat the leader! May their rule be just and fair.
